titles.title: Expressing support for frontline workers, residents of long-term care facilities, individuals with preexisting conditions, and K-12 educators to receive priority access to a COVID-19 vaccine.
Expressing support for frontline workers, residents of long-term care facilities, individuals with preexisting conditions, and K-12 educators to receive priority access to a COVID-19 vaccine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Department of Health and Human Services
Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution encourages efforts to give priority access to COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) vaccines to frontline workers, residents of long-term care facilities, individuals with preexisting health conditions, and teachers.
